original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is the knower of the world, the knower of the realm of beings, the supreme charioteer, the trainer of the untamed, teach the Dharma?🔽Householder, the Tathāgata, who is the knower of the world, the knower of the realm of beings, the supreme charioteer, the trainer of the untamed, teaches the Dharma by means of four forms of fearlessness.🔽What are the four?

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te /
translated: They are: fearlessness in asserting perfect enlightenment; fearlessness in asserting the destruction of defilements; fearlessness in asserting the obstacles to attaining the noble fruits; and fearlessness in asserting the path that leads to liberation.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: Having liberated countless sentient beings from suffering and established them in happiness,

original: rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
translated: he knows the cessation of the knowledge of karmic ripening.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: Moreover, it is a quality that has been unborn from the beginning.

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa @33a *//
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa @33a *//
translated: Householder, in this way

original: 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of karmic ripening.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: When asked about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of karmic ripening, he answers for an eon, and he answers for up to an inexpressible number of inexpressibly long eons.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so; ;de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so; ;de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: His eloquence is inexhaustible.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata, who is perfectly enlightened with regard to the cessation of the knowledge of karmic maturation, know the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of karmic maturation?”

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa gang gis rnam par smin pa shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa gang gis rnam par smin pa shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: “Householder, in this case, the Tathāgata knows as it truly is the cessation of the knowledge of karmic maturation that is to be fully known,

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: to be comprehended,🔽and to be actualized.

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te; gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /🔽gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te; gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am / gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one abides in the observation of the absence of taste,🔽if one abides in the observation of the disadvantages,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa ste /
translated: or if one abides in the observation of the escape,

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: householder,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba @33b bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba @33b bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: in that way the Tathāgata, who is perfectly enlightened with regard to the cessation of the knowledge of karmic maturation, knows the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of karmic maturation as it truly is.”🔽“Excellent, excellent, Gautama!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: When asked about the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the ripening of the Tathagatas, he would answer for an eon, or for an incalculable eon, or for as many incalculable eons as there are sands in the Ganges river.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would not fail him.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and this mansion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, know and see the knowledge of the path that leads everywhere?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽'di ltar zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / 'di ltar zhugs pa ni /
translated: Householder, here the Tathagata knows thus:

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye'o //🔽'di ltar zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye'o // 'di ltar zhugs pa ni /
translated: One who has entered this path will be reborn in the world of Yama.

original: lha ma yin du skye'o //🔽'di ltar zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: lha ma yin du skye'o // 'di ltar zhugs pa ni /
translated: One who has entered this path will be reborn as an asura.

original: mir skye'o zhes bya ba nas 'di ltar zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: mir skye'o zhes bya ba nas 'di ltar zhugs pa ni /
translated: One who has entered this path will be reborn as a human.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du skye'o //🔽'di ltar zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du skye'o // 'di ltar zhugs pa ni /
translated: He is born in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: lhar skye'o // 'di ni /
analyzed: lhar skye'o // 'di ni /
translated: He is born as a god.🔽He is born as a human.

original: mir skye'o // zhes khyim bdag /
analyzed: mir skye'o // zhes khyim bdag /
translated: Householder,

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: thus

original: de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du @34a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du @34a *//
translated: the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads everywhere.

original: med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: And if he were to be asked about that knowledge of the path that leads everywhere, the Tathāgata would answer for an eon, or for an eon minus one instant, or for an eon plus one instant, or for eons that are beyond measure, beyond number,

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: and his eloquence would not cease.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and this mansion.🔽Householder,

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: how

original: de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata, exactly and in accordance with reality, know the knowledge of the arising of the path that leads everywhere?”

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, in this regard, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to; ;khyim bdag /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to; ;khyim bdag /
translated: ‘Having planted roots of virtue with immeasurable buddha bhagavāns, the knowledge of the arising is accomplished.’ The Tathāgata knows that exactly and in accordance with reality.

original: gzhan yang rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Moreover, the Tathāgata exactly and in accordance with reality knows the causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the path that leads everywhere is accomplished.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has understood as it really is the abiding in the observation of impermanence, up to the abiding in the observation of the adversary.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus @34b pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus @34b pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: “If one were to ask about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads everywhere, his answer would be given for an eon or for an eon it might be given that he would not finish his answers.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would not fail.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the path that leads everywhere?🔽“

original: khyim bdag / 'di la rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata thoroughly knows the causes and conditions that are the causes and conditions for the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the path that goes everywhere.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung pa nas de ni /🔽tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung pa nas de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one were to ask about the knowledge of the cessation of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that goes everywhere, his answer would be spoken for an eon, or for more than an eon.🔽“Householder, one who has doubts or uncertainty about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that goes everywhere will not attain parinirvāṇa for that many eons, and will not attain parinirvāṇa for that many eons.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na; de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na; de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata thoroughly know the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the path that goes everywhere?

original: khyim bdag 'di la shes pa gang gis thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag 'di la shes pa gang gis thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: “Householder, there is the knowledge by which the knowledge of the path that goes everywhere is known,

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: understood,

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin @35a *//
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin @35a *//
translated: The knowledge of the cessation that has been realized is the perfect realization of the cessation that has been realized.🔽

original: rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: He fully knows the cessation of the knowledge of cessation that has been realized, just as it is.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /🔽gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am / gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If he abides in the observation of the absence of enjoyment,🔽if he abides in the observation of the disadvantages,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa ste /
translated: or if he abides in the observation of escape,

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: householder, in that way

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par smin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata fully knows, just as they are, the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of ripening.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: If he were to answer questions about that knowledge of the cessation of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads everywhere, he would answer for an eon, or even more than that.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how

original: de bzhin gshegs pas khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: How does the Tathāgata know the elements as they are in reality?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /🔽mig gi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te / mig gi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata knows the eye element as it is in reality.🔽He knows the knowledge of the arising of the eye element,

original: mig gi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa /
analyzed: mig gi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa /
translated: he knows the knowledge of the cessation of the eye element,

original: mig gi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: mig gi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: and he knows the knowledge of the path the cessation of the eye element as it is in reality.

original: gzugs kyi khams shes te gzugs kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams shes te gzugs kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
translated: He knows the form element, he knows the arising of the knowledge of the form element,

original: gzugs @35b kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa /
analyzed: gzugs @35b kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa /
translated: he knows the cessation of the knowledge of the form element,

original: gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes te /
translated: and he knows the path the cessation of the knowledge of the form element as it is in reality.🔽He knows the eye consciousness element,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
translated: he knows the arising of the knowledge of the eye consciousness element,🔽and he knows the cessation of the knowledge of the eye consciousness element.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: He knows the cessation of the eye consciousness element.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: He knows the path the cessation of the eye consciousness element, just as it is.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: In the same way, he knows the ear element, the sound element, and the ear consciousness element; he knows the nose element, the smell element, and the nose consciousness element; he knows the tongue element, the flavor element, and the tongue consciousness element;

original: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes so //
analyzed: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes so //
translated: he knows the body element, the tangible-object element, and the body consciousness element;

original: yid kyi khams shes te /🔽yid kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: yid kyi khams shes te / yid kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
translated: he knows the mind element;🔽he knows the origin of the mind element;

original: yid kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: yid kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: he knows the cessation of the mind element;

original: yid kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes so; ;chos kyi khams shes te /
analyzed: yid kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes so; ;chos kyi khams shes te /
translated: he knows the path the cessation of the mind element. He knows the mental-object element;

original: chos kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
analyzed: chos kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /
translated: He knows the knowledge of the element of mental objects.

original: chos kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes /🔽chos kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur @36a *//
analyzed: chos kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes / chos kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur @36a *//
translated: He knows the cessation of the knowledge of the element of mental objects.

original: ba'i lam shes so //🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes te /
analyzed: ba'i lam shes so // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes te /
translated: He knows the path to the cessation of the knowledge of the element of mental objects.🔽He knows the element of mental consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes /🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes /
translated: He knows the arising of the knowledge of the element of mental consciousness.🔽He knows the cessation of the knowledge of the element of mental consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He knows the path to the cessation of the knowledge of the element of mental consciousness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /🔽khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na / khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the eye consciousness as it really is?

original: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyur byas pa dang ba gang yin pa ni /
analyzed: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyur byas pa dang ba gang yin pa ni /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata knows as it really is the clear form that is made from the cause of the great elements that are appropriated.

original: mig gi rnam par smin pa ste; gang gi mig la gzugs su snang bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par smin pa ste; gang gi mig la gzugs su snang bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: It is the eye’s ripening, that which appears as form to the eye,

original: gzugs kyang thogs pa dang / mig gzugs rnams la thogs pa gang yin pa dang / gang du mig kyang gzugs la thogs pa dang / mig gang gis gzugs mthong ba dang / lta ba dang / lta bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs mthong bar bya ba'i phyir rtag tu tha mi dad par rung ba'i mig gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs kyang thogs pa dang / mig gzugs rnams la thogs pa gang yin pa dang / gang du mig kyang gzugs la thogs pa dang / mig gang gis gzugs mthong ba dang / lta ba dang / lta bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs mthong bar bya ba'i phyir rtag tu tha mi dad par rung ba'i mig gang yin pa dang /
translated: that which obstructs form, that which obstructs the eye and form, that which obstructs the eye in form, that eye by which form is seen, that which is seen, that which will be seen, and that eye which is always suitable to be inseparable from that which sees form.

original: khams bco brgyad dag las mig gi khams gang yin pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dag las mig gi skye mched @36b gang yin pa dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dag las mig gi dbang po gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: khams bco brgyad dag las mig gi khams gang yin pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dag las mig gi skye mched @36b gang yin pa dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dag las mig gi dbang po gang yin pa ste /
translated: From among the eighteen elements, it is the eye element; from among the twelve sense spheres, it is the eye sense sphere; and from among the twenty-two faculties, it is the eye faculty.

original: de ni / mig kyang yin /🔽de ni / mig gi khams kyang yin /🔽de ni / mig gi skye mched kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / mig kyang yin / de ni / mig gi khams kyang yin / de ni / mig gi skye mched kyang yin /
translated: It is the eye.🔽It is the eye element.🔽It is the eye sense sphere.

original: de ni / mig gi dbang po'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / mig gi dbang po'ang yin /
translated: It is the eye faculty.

original: de ni / sgo yang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sgo yang yin /
translated: It is a door.

original: de ni / dkar ba yang yin /🔽de ni / rgyun kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / dkar ba yang yin / de ni / rgyun kyang yin /
translated: It is also white.🔽It is also a stream.

original: de ni / mtsho'ang yin /🔽de ni rgya mtsho'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / mtsho'ang yin / de ni rgya mtsho'ang yin /
translated: It is also an ocean.🔽It is also a great ocean.

original: de ni / klong yang yin /
analyzed: de ni / klong yang yin /
translated: It is also a lake.

original: de ni / snang ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / snang ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also a light.

original: de ni / chu 'byung yang yin /🔽de ni / khrid byed kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / chu 'byung yang yin / de ni / khrid byed kyang yin /
translated: It is also a source of water.🔽It is also a guide.

original: de ni / 'dren byed kyang yin /🔽de ni; gzhi'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / 'dren byed kyang yin / de ni; gzhi'ang yin /
translated: It is also a leader.🔽It is also a basis.

original: de ni / sbubs kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sbubs kyang yin /
translated: It is also a womb.

original: de ni / gsang ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / gsang ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also a secret.

original: de ni / pha rol gyi 'gram ma yin pa'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / pha rol gyi 'gram ma yin pa'ang yin /
translated: It is also not the other shore.

original: de ni / bdud kyi snod kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / bdud kyi snod kyang yin /
translated: It is also a vessel of Māra.

original: de ni; bdag gi dngos por 'jug pa'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni; bdag gi dngos por 'jug pa'ang yin /
translated: It is also the engagement with one’s own entity.

original: de ni / grong stong par 'jug pa'ang yin /🔽de ni / mngon par shes par bya ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / grong stong par 'jug pa'ang yin / de ni / mngon par shes par bya ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also the engagement with an empty village.🔽It is also to be cognized.

original: de ni / yongs su shes par bya ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / yongs su shes par bya ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also to be fully understood.

original: de ni / spang bar bya ba'ang yin te /
analyzed: de ni / spang bar bya ba'ang yin te /
translated: It is also to be abandoned.

original: 'di ni / mig gi khams shes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mig gi khams shes bya'o //
translated: This is called the eye element.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, illumination, realization, full understanding, and expertise that is in regard to that is

original: mig gi khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: mig gi khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: the knowledge of the eye constituent.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba @37a *//
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba @37a *//
translated: The Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the eye constituent

original: bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas bskal ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas bskal ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about that knowledge of the eye constituent, he could answer for an eon or for eons as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river, or for eons beyond that.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would not cease.

original: khyim bdag / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Householder, why is that?

original: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings bla na med pa mkhyen rab kyis shin tu thugs su chud par mdzad cing /
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings bla na med pa mkhyen rab kyis shin tu thugs su chud par mdzad cing /
translated: It is because the Tathāgata has fully understood the unsurpassed Dharma realm with his wisdom.

original: gang thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: gang thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: The Tathāgata, who has realized the eye constituent, is also inexhaustible when questioned about it.

original: khyim bdag / de lta bas na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: 'dir gang gi ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dir gang gi ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug pa de ni /
translated: householder, whoever has unobstructed vision of wisdom

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: know the eye constituent’s origination as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows this thus:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas mig gi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag @37b bar 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas mig gi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag @37b bar 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Having planted the roots of virtue with immeasurable Buddha Bhagavans, the knowledge of the arising of the eye element is perfectly accomplished. The Tathagata knows it as it truly is.

original: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis mig gi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de ngang /
analyzed: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis mig gi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de ngang /
translated: Householder, furthermore, the Tathagata knows as it truly is the cause and condition by which the knowledge of the arising of the eye element is perfectly accomplished.

original: rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: He knows as it truly is:

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: If one abides in the observation of impermanence, up to if one abides in the observation of opposition, the Tathagata knows it as it truly is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag la lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag la lan gsung ste /
translated: If he were to be asked about the knowledge of the arising of the eye element, he would answer for an eon or even for ineffable eons.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would be inexhaustible.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the eye element?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: Having benefited immeasurable sentient beings and turned them away from what is not beneficial,

original: snang ba @38a *//
analyzed: snang ba @38a *//
translated: he has attained the light of wisdom.

original: byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni mig gi khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni mig gi khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
translated: This is the cessation of the eye element’s cognition,

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: which is primordially unborn.

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: Householder, in this way

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata has thoroughly understood the cessation of the eye element’s cognition just as it is.🔽If one were to ask the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the cessation of the eye element’s cognition, he could answer for an eon or more than an eon,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: up to inexpressibly inexpressible eons.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would not be exhausted.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te de ni /
translated: In the same vein,

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: he will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: How does the Tathāgata know the path to the cessation of the knowledge of the eye constituent just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis mig gi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis mig gi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: Householder, in this case, the Tathāgata knows the path to the cessation of the knowledge of the eye constituent through a knowledge that fully knows,

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: penetrates,

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa /
translated: and actualizes cessation.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one abides in the observation of the absence of enjoyment,

original: gal te nyes @38b dmigs rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes @38b dmigs rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: or if one abides in the observation of the disadvantages,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if one abides in the observation of deliverance, the Tathāgata knows that just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about that knowledge of the path to the cessation of the knowledge of the eye constituent, he would answer for an eon or more.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He will enjoy himself in the sandalwood groves and in the mansions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is thus gone, know the form realm as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi kha dog dang / dbyibs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi kha dog dang / dbyibs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata knows the color and shape of the form realm as it really is.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / dbyibs legs pa dang / dbyibs ma legs pa dang / mdog bzang ba dang / mdog ngan pa dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / kha dog bzang po'i mdog dang / mdog nag po dang /
analyzed: kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / dbyibs legs pa dang / dbyibs ma legs pa dang / mdog bzang ba dang / mdog ngan pa dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / kha dog bzang po'i mdog dang / mdog nag po dang /
translated: good color and bad color, good shape and bad shape, good complexion and bad complexion, bad color and good color, black complexion and

original: ser po dang / so mdog lta bu dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel mdog dang / gru bzhi dang / cha drug pa dang / cha brgyad pa dang / cha bcu drug pa dang / zur gsum pa dang /
analyzed: ser po dang / so mdog lta bu dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel mdog dang / gru bzhi dang / cha drug pa dang / cha brgyad pa dang / cha bcu drug pa dang / zur gsum pa dang /
translated: crystal,🔽square,🔽hexagonal,🔽octagonal,🔽hexadecagonal,🔽triangular,🔽low,🔽high,🔽even,

original: dma' ba dang / mtho ba dang / mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / grib @39a *//
analyzed: dma' ba dang / mtho ba dang / mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / grib @39a *//
translated: uneven,🔽shadow,🔽sun,🔽cloud,🔽cloudless,

original: ma dang / nyi ma dang / sprin dang / sprin med pa dang / du ba dang / rdul dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / snang ba dang / mun pa dang / mtshan ma snang ba 'di ni /
analyzed: ma dang / nyi ma dang / sprin dang / sprin med pa dang / du ba dang / rdul dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / snang ba dang / mun pa dang / mtshan ma snang ba 'di ni /
translated: smoke,🔽dust,🔽illusion,🔽mirage,🔽light,🔽and darkness.

original: gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called the form realm.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, thorough understanding, and expertise regarding that is called

original: gzugs kyi khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: the knowledge of the form realm.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of form just as it is.🔽“If one were to ask why the Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the form element just as it is,🔽he would answer that question for eons, for hundreds of eons, for thousands of eons, for hundreds of thousands of eons, and he would still not finish answering that question.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: “Householder, if one were to ask why the Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the form element just as it is,

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: he would answer that question for eons, for hundreds of eons, for thousands of eons, for hundreds of thousands of eons, and he would still not finish answering that question.🔽“If one were to ask why the Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the form element just as it is,🔽he would answer that question for eons, for hundreds of eons, for thousands of eons, for hundreds of thousands of eons, and he would still not finish answering that question.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /🔽khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na / khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “If one were to ask why the Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the form element just as it is,🔽he would answer that question for eons, for hundreds of eons, for thousands of eons, for hundreds of thousands of eons, and he would still not finish answering that question.🔽“If one were to ask why the Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the form element just as it is,🔽he would answer that question for eons, for hundreds of eons, for thousands of eons, for hundreds of thousands of eons, and he would still not finish answering that question.🔽“If one were to ask why the Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the form element just as it is,🔽he would answer that question for eons, for hundreds of eons, for thousands of eons, for hundreds of thousands of eons, and he would still not finish answering that question.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas gzugs kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta @39b ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas gzugs kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta @39b ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: “If one were to ask why the Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the form element just as it is,🔽he would answer that question for eons, for hundreds of eons, for thousands of eons, for hundreds of thousands of eons, and he would still not finish answering that question.🔽“If one were to ask why the Tathāgata has fully

original: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis gzugs kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis gzugs kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, furthermore, the Tathāgata perfectly understands as it really is the causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the origin of the form realm is achieved.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: If one abides in the observation of impermanence, up to if one abides in the observation of opposition, the Tathāgata perfectly understands that as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: When asked about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the origin of the form realm, he would answer for an eon, up to he would answer for inexpressibly inexpressible eons.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would not be exhausted.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the fine mansion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is thus gone, know the knowledge of the cessation of the form realm as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, in this regard, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: ‘Having done what was meaningful for countless sentient beings, having turned away what was not meaningful,

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te /
translated: having made light, having dispelled darkness,

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs @40a *//
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs @40a *//
translated: having liberated countless sentient beings from suffering,

original: su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: having led them to happiness,

original: gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
translated: the cessation of the knowledge of the form realm

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no; ;khyim bdag /
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no; ;khyim bdag /
translated: is from the beginning a dharma that is unborn.’

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: “Householder, thus

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata perfectly knows the knowledge of the cessation of the form realm.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the cessation of the form realm, he would answer for an eon without coming to the end of his answers.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, you will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and mansion.🔽Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the form realm?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata, through a knowledge, perfectly knows the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the form realm.

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: He fully understands it and realizes it.

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su lta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su lta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If the cessation of the knowledge of the form realm is the absence of relishing, it is the state of observing the path.

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If he abides in the contemplation of the faults of the form realm,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa 'di ni /
translated: or if he abides in the contemplation of the deliverance from the form realm,

original: gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam @40b shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam @40b shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: this is called the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the form realm.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has perfect knowledge of that as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: If there were a question about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the form realm, he could answer it, and he would continue to answer questions about this topic for eons, for eons, for countless eons.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would never come to an end.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and this mansion.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how is it

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: How does the Tathāgata know the eye consciousness element as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ste /
analyzed: mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ste /
translated: “Eye consciousness arises in dependence on the eye and forms.

original: dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de skye ba na nang gi mig las kyang ma byung /
analyzed: dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de skye ba na nang gi mig las kyang ma byung /
translated: The characteristic of the individual cognition of things, when it arises, does not come from the internal eye,

original: phyi rol gyi gzugs las kyang ma 'ongs /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi gzugs las kyang ma 'ongs /
translated: nor does it come from external forms,

original: bar du rnam par bzung ste yang mi gnas mod kyi /🔽'on kyang mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ste; de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: bar du rnam par bzung ste yang mi gnas mod kyi / 'on kyang mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ste; de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: nor does it abide in between.🔽Nevertheless, eye consciousness arises in dependence on the eye and forms.🔽The Tathāgata knows that as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba @41a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba @41a *//
translated: The Tathāgata’s knowledge of the eye consciousness element is such that he is able to answer any question regarding it.

original: zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If asked, he would answer for an eon, or even longer than that.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is thus gone, know the knowledge of the arising of the eye consciousness element just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, in this regard the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta bzhin rab tu mkhyen to🔽// khyim bdag /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // khyim bdag /
translated: ‘Having planted the roots of virtue with immeasurable lord buddhas, the knowledge of the arising of the eye consciousness element is accomplished. ’ The Tathāgata knows this just as it is.

original: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Moreover, the Tathāgata knows this just as it is:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: He knows perfectly the causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the arising of the eye consciousness element is accomplished.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one dwells contemplating impermanence,

original: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if one dwells contemplating the adversary, the Tathāgata knows it just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs @41b pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i par dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs @41b pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i par dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: If one were to question the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the arising of the eye consciousness element, he could answer correctly for an eon or more than an eon,

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: and he would enjoy doing so in this sandalwood palace.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how is it that

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata, who is skilled in the knowledge of the cessation of the eye consciousness element,

original: 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: know the cessation of the eye consciousness element?”

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: ‘Having done what was meaningful for countless sentient beings, having turned away from what was not meaningful,

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par mdzad nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par mdzad nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: having given light, having dispelled darkness, having liberated countless sentient beings from suffering, having brought them to bliss,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
translated: the cessation of the eye consciousness element

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //🔽khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no // khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: is unborn from the beginning.’🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata, who is skilled in the knowledge of the cessation of the eye consciousness element,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: knows the cessation of the eye consciousness element in accordance with reality.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba @42a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba @42a *//
translated: “Tathāgata, if I were to ask about the knowledge of the cessation of the eye consciousness element, you would answer for an eon.

original: nas de ni /🔽tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: nas de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: “Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, who has understood the cessation of the eye consciousness element, understand the cessation of the eye consciousness element?’ he would answer, ‘Bhikṣus, the cessation of the eye consciousness element is the cessation of suffering and the attainment of nirvāṇa.’🔽“Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, who has understood the cessation of the eye consciousness element, understand the path that leads to the cessation of the eye consciousness element?’ he would answer, ‘The path that leads to the cessation of the eye consciousness element is the noble eightfold path, namely, right view, right intention, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right concentration.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who has understood the cessation of the eye consciousness element, understand the path that leads to the cessation of the eye consciousness element?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata has understood this:

original: shes pa gang gis mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: shes pa gang gis mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: ‘The knowledge by which the eye consciousness element is known,

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: is understood,
