analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: and is actualized—that knowledge of cessation is understood as it really is.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one abides in the observation of the absence of enjoyment,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If they abide in the view of the disadvantages,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if they abide in the view of the escape, the Tathāgata knows them just as they are.🔽“The Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One, knowing the cessation of the eye consciousness element,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: and knowing the path leading to the cessation of the eye consciousness element, when asked about it, would answer at length.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i khams shes pa yang @42b dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i khams shes pa yang @42b dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One, know the ear element just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata has understood this thus:

original: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyur byas pa gang yin pa dang ba gang yin pa ni /
analyzed: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyur byas pa gang yin pa dang ba gang yin pa ni /
translated: That which is clear and is made the basis of the great elements is

original: rna ba'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: the result of the ear.

original: gang gi rna ba la sgrar snang bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang gi rna ba la sgrar snang bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: It is the ear that is suitable for the appearance of sound.

original: rna ba gang sgra la thogs pa dang / rna ba gang la sgra thogs pa dang / rna ba gang gis sgra thos par gyur ba dang / thos pa dang / thos par 'gyur ba dang / sgra dag thos par bya ba'i phyir yang rtag tu tha mi dad cing rung ba'i rna ba gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rna ba gang sgra la thogs pa dang / rna ba gang la sgra thogs pa dang / rna ba gang gis sgra thos par gyur ba dang / thos pa dang / thos par 'gyur ba dang / sgra dag thos par bya ba'i phyir yang rtag tu tha mi dad cing rung ba'i rna ba gang yin pa dang /
translated: It is the ear that is obstructed by sound, the ear that is obstructed by sound, the ear that hears sound, the ear that has heard, the ear that will hear, and the ear that is always suitable for hearing sounds.

original: khams bco brgyad dag las rna ba'i khams gang yin pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dag las rna ba'i skye mched gang yin pa dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dag las rna ba'i dbang po gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: khams bco brgyad dag las rna ba'i khams gang yin pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dag las rna ba'i skye mched gang yin pa dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dag las rna ba'i dbang po gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the ear element among the eighteen elements, the ear sense base among the twelve sense bases, and the ear faculty among the twenty-two faculties.

original: de ni / rna ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / rna ba'ang yin /
translated: It is the ear.

original: de ni / khams kyang yin /🔽de ni / rna ba'i skye mched kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / khams kyang yin / de ni / rna ba'i skye mched kyang yin /
translated: It is the element.🔽It is the ear sense base.

original: de ni / rna ba'i dbang po'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / rna ba'i dbang po'ang yin /
translated: It is the ear faculty.

original: de ni / sgo'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sgo'ang yin /
translated: It is the door.

original: de ni / dkar ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / dkar ba'ang yin /
translated: It is the white.

original: de ni / rgyun kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / rgyun kyang yin /
translated: It is the continuum.

original: de ni mtsho'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni mtsho'ang yin /
translated: It is also a lake.

original: de ni rgya mtsho'ang yin /🔽de ni klong yang yin /
analyzed: de ni rgya mtsho'ang yin / de ni klong yang yin /
translated: It is also an ocean.🔽It is also a vast expanse.

original: de ni snang ba'ang yin; de ni /
analyzed: de ni snang ba'ang yin; de ni /
translated: It is also light.

original: chu 'byung yang yin /🔽de ni / khrid byed kyang yin //
analyzed: chu 'byung yang yin / de ni / khrid byed kyang yin //
translated: It is also the source of water.🔽It is also the guide.

original: de ni / 'dren byed kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / 'dren byed kyang yin /
translated: It is also the leader.

original: de ni / sbubs kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sbubs kyang yin /
translated: It is also the womb.

original: de ni / gsang ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / gsang ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also the secret.

original: de ni / zhing @43a *//🔽yang yin / de ni /
analyzed: de ni / zhing @43a *// yang yin / de ni /
translated: It is also the field.

original: gzhi'ang yin / de ni /
analyzed: gzhi'ang yin / de ni /
translated: It is also the basis.

original: pha rol gyi 'gram ma yin pa'ang yin /
analyzed: pha rol gyi 'gram ma yin pa'ang yin /
translated: It is also not the other shore.

original: de ni / bdud kyi snod kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / bdud kyi snod kyang yin /
translated: It is also the vessel of Māra.

original: de ni / grong stong par 'jug pa'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / grong stong par 'jug pa'ang yin /
translated: It is also entering an empty village.

original: de ni / bdag gi dngos por 'jug pa'ang yin /🔽de ni / mngon par shes par bya ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / bdag gi dngos por 'jug pa'ang yin / de ni / mngon par shes par bya ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also entering one’s own body.🔽It is also to be directly perceived.

original: de ni / yongs su shes par bya ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / yongs su shes par bya ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also to be fully understood.

original: de ni / spang bar bya ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / spang bar bya ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also to be abandoned.

original: 'di ni / rna ba'i khams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / rna ba'i khams zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the auditory element.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /🔽rna ba'i khams shes pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni / rna ba'i khams shes pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, thorough understanding, and expertise that are related to that are🔽called the knowledge of the ear constituent.🔽

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu bzhus pa na bskal par lung gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to // de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu bzhus pa na bskal par lung gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: The Tathāgata has fully known the ear element to be just as it is.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: The Tathāgata, the arhat, the perfectly awakened Buddha, who is skilled in the knowledge of the ear element, when asked, can explain it for eons, for eons of incalculable duration, for eons of incalculable magnitude, and his skill in the knowledge of the ear element would not come to an end.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.

original: bam po gsum pa /
analyzed: bam po gsum pa /
translated: The third chapter.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how is it that the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened Buddha, who is skilled in the knowledge of the ear element,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i khams shes pa @43b kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i khams shes pa @43b kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One know the knowledge of the arising of the ear constituent as it really is?”

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas rna ba'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / khyim bdag /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas rna ba'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / khyim bdag /
translated: ‘Having planted wholesome roots with immeasurable lord buddhas, the knowledge of the arising of the ear constituent is accomplished.’🔽“Moreover, the Tathāgata knows as it really is, by means of the knowledge of the way things really are, the cause and the reason for the arising of the knowledge of the arising of the ear constituent.

original: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis rna ba'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis rna ba'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Moreover, the Tathāgata knows as it really is, by means of the knowledge of the way things really are, the cause and the reason for the arising of the knowledge of the arising of the ear constituent.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has understood as it really is the abiding in the observation of impermanence, and so on, up to the abiding in the observation of opposition.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the ear element, he could answer for an eon, or for an eon minus one instant, or for an eon less than that.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy it in this sandalwood palace.🔽“Householder, how does the Tathāgata, Worthy, Perfectly Awakened One, know the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element as it really is?🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.

original: khyim bdag / 'di de la de bzhin gshegs pas sems @44a *//🔽can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di de la de bzhin gshegs pas sems @44a *//🔽can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element.🔽Householder

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: He has dispelled darkness and liberated countless beings from suffering, leading them to happiness.

original: rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
translated: The cessation of the ear element is

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: primordially unborn.

original: khyim bdag de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: khyim bdag de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata, through correct knowledge, knows in this way the cessation of the knowledge of the ear element as it truly is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the cessation of the ear element, he would answer for an eon and beyond that.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would not be exhausted.

original: de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.”

original: khyim bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: khyim bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is endowed with the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the ear element, know it as it really is?

original: khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang dag gis rna ba'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /🔽khong du chud /
analyzed: khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang dag gis rna ba'i khams shes pa yongs su shes / khong du chud /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, who has the knowledge of the ear element,🔽knows it as it really is,

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: and the knowledge of the cessation of the ear element is also known by him as it really is.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par @44b rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par @44b rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one dwells contemplating pleasure in the ear element,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: if one dwells contemplating danger in the ear element,

original: gal te nges bar 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges bar 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: if one dwells contemplating the escape from the ear element, the Tathāgata knows it as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: When asked about the knowledge of the cessation of the ear element, he would answer for eons, for inexpressibly inexpressible numbers of eons.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would be inexhaustible.

original: de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: khyim bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the sound element?

original: khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'byung ba chen po la shin tu brten pa'i sgra'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'byung ba chen po la shin tu brten pa'i sgra'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, in this case, the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the sound element that is based on the great elements.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: sgra snyan pa nyid dang / sgra mi snyan pa nyid dang / sgra snyan cing 'jebs pa nyid dang / sgra snyan cing 'jebs pa ma yin pa nyid dang / sgra yid du 'ong ba nyid dang / sgra yid du mi 'ong ba nyid dang /
analyzed: sgra snyan pa nyid dang / sgra mi snyan pa nyid dang / sgra snyan cing 'jebs pa nyid dang / sgra snyan cing 'jebs pa ma yin pa nyid dang / sgra yid du 'ong ba nyid dang / sgra yid du mi 'ong ba nyid dang /
translated: pleasant sounds, unpleasant sounds, agreeable sounds, disagreeable sounds, pleasant sounds, unpleasant sounds,

original: sgra nyan par 'os pa nyid dang / sgra dga' bar byed pa nyid dang / sgra mi mthun pa nyid dang / sgra mthun pa ma yin pa nyid dang / dung gi sgra dang / rnga bo che'i sgra dang / rdza rnga'i sgra dang / @45a *//
analyzed: sgra nyan par 'os pa nyid dang / sgra dga' bar byed pa nyid dang / sgra mi mthun pa nyid dang / sgra mthun pa ma yin pa nyid dang / dung gi sgra dang / rnga bo che'i sgra dang / rdza rnga'i sgra dang / @45a *//
translated: sounds that are worthy of being heard, sounds that are delightful, discordant sounds, non-harmonious sounds, sounds of conches, sounds of bherī drums, sounds of kettledrums,

original: 'khar rnga'i sgra dang / chu sgra rnam par go bar byed pa'i sgra dang / me'i sgra dang / chu'i sgra dang / rlung gi sgra dang / 'brug gi sgra 'ur 'ur ba dang / glog las byung ba'i sgra dang / ser ba 'bab pa'i sgra dang /
analyzed: 'khar rnga'i sgra dang / chu sgra rnam par go bar byed pa'i sgra dang / me'i sgra dang / chu'i sgra dang / rlung gi sgra dang / 'brug gi sgra 'ur 'ur ba dang / glog las byung ba'i sgra dang / ser ba 'bab pa'i sgra dang /
translated: sounds of small kettledrums, sounds of water, sounds that make one understand, sounds of fire, sounds of water, sounds of wind, sounds of thunder, sounds of lightning, sounds of hail,

original: zin pa dang ma zin pa dag gi 'byung ba chen po 'dus pa'i sgra 'di ni /
analyzed: zin pa dang ma zin pa dag gi 'byung ba chen po 'dus pa'i sgra 'di ni /
translated: sounds of the great elements that are grasped and not grasped.

original: sgra'i khams zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sgra'i khams zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called the element of sound.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud ba dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud ba dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, full understanding, and expertise regarding that is called

original: sgra'i khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sgra'i khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: the knowledge of the element of sound.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has fully understood it just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: If someone were to ask the Tathāgata a question about the knowledge of the element of sound that would take an eon to ask, the Tathāgata would have the ability to answer that question and to teach on that seat for an eon.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: He would have the ability to teach for even longer than an eon.

original: de ni; tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni; tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who has understood the arising of the element of sound, understand it just as it is?🔽“

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata has understood this and so on as before.🔽Having planted wholesome roots with immeasurable Buddha Bhagavāns, the knowledge of the sound element is accomplished.

original: sangs rgyas bcom @45b ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas sgra'i khams shes pa yang dag pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / khyim bdag /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom @45b ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas sgra'i khams shes pa yang dag pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / khyim bdag /
translated: Householder,

original: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: the Tathāgata has understood this and so on as before.

original: rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dag gis sgra'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dag gis sgra'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the arising of the sound element is accomplished, those causes and conditions he knows as they are.

original: gal te mi rtag bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one abides in the observation of impermanence,

original: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: up to if one abides in the observation of opposition, the Tathāgata knows that as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: “Householder, when asked, ‘What is the knowledge of the arising of the knowledge of the element of sound? ’ the Tathāgata would answer for an eon, and so on, up to

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: he will enjoy this place, from the sandalwood walkways up to the fine mansions.🔽“Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is the knower of the ultimate truth,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: know the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the element of sound?

original: khyim bdag // 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag // 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: ‘Having done what was to be done and having given up what was not to be done,

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal @46a *//
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal @46a *//
translated: having given light and having dispelled darkness,

original: te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: having liberated countless beings from suffering and having led them to happiness,

original: sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
translated: this is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the element of sound.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can ni //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can ni //
translated: That which is essentially unborn

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Householder, in that way🔽the Tathāgata, through his knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the sound constituent, knows as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the sound constituent.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And if the Tathāgata were to explain the answer to that question, he could do so for an eon or more than an eon.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: And he would enjoy it in this place, in the sandalwood forest and the multistoried building.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na khyim bdag /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na khyim bdag /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, through his knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the sound constituent, know the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the sound constituent?

original: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas shes pa gang gis sgra'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas shes pa gang gis sgra'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata, through a knowledge that knows the knowledge of the sound constituent,

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: knows it as it really is.

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: He knows the cessation of the knowledge of the cessation that has been realized just as it is.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one abides in the subsequent view without savoring,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas @46b pa'am; gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas @46b pa'am; gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: if one abides in the subsequent view of the faults, or if one abides in the subsequent view of liberation, the Tathāgata knows that just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sgra'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the sound element, he would answer for an eon or longer.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the fine mansion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the knowledge of the ear consciousness just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows this as it really is:

original: rna ba dang sgra la brten nas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ste; dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid skye ba na rna ba'i nang nas kyang ma byung /
analyzed: rna ba dang sgra la brten nas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ste; dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid skye ba na rna ba'i nang nas kyang ma byung /
translated: Ear consciousness arises in dependence on the ear and sounds. When that which has the defining characteristic of the awareness of individual entities arises, it does not come from the ear,

original: phyi rol gyi sgra dag las kyang ma 'ongs /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi sgra dag las kyang ma 'ongs /
translated: nor does it come from external sounds.

original: bar du rnam par bzung ste'ang mi gnas mod kyi /
analyzed: bar du rnam par bzung ste'ang mi gnas mod kyi /
translated: It is not apprehended as being in between, and yet

original: 'on kyang tshogs pa'i dbang gis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyes la /
analyzed: 'on kyang tshogs pa'i dbang gis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyes la /
translated: the ear consciousness arises due to the power of the assembly of causes and conditions.

original: de'i 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med la /
analyzed: de'i 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med la /
translated: It has no coming, no going,

original: stong zhing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin no //
analyzed: stong zhing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin no //
translated: and is empty and devoid of intrinsic existence.🔽The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, thorough understanding, and expertise

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin @47a *//🔽pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin @47a *// pa 'di ni /
translated: with regard to that

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: is called ‘the knowledge of the consciousness element of the ear.’

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the ear and sound in its reality.🔽“If one were to ask why, it is because the Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the ear and sound in its reality.🔽The Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the ear and sound in its reality.🔽“If one were to ask why, it is because the Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the ear and sound in its reality.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /🔽khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata has fully known the suchness of the ear and sound in its reality.🔽“If one were to ask why, it is because the Tath

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / khyim bdag /
translated: Having generated the roots of virtue in the presence of immeasurable blessed buddhas, they will accomplish knowledge of the origin of the consciousness element of the ear.🔽“Householder,

original: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: the Thus-Gone One also knows in the following way:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par @47b 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par @47b 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: ‘The causes and conditions by which knowledge of the origin of the consciousness element of the ear is accomplished are known by the Thus-Gone One exactly as they are.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: If one were to ask the Thus-Gone One about knowledge of the origin of the consciousness element of the ear, he would answer for an eon or even for eons beyond measure.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so; ;de ni /
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so; ;de ni /
translated: His eloquence is inexhaustible.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and this fine house.🔽“Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is thus gone, know the knowledge that is the cessation of the ear-consciousness element as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, this is how the Tathāgata knows the knowledge that is the cessation of the ear-consciousness element as it really is:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: having done what needed to be done and having turned away from what should not be done,

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: having given light and removed darkness, having liberated countless beings from suffering, and having established them in happiness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
translated: the knowledge that is the cessation of the ear-consciousness element is known.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: It is also a quality that has not arisen from the beginning.

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata, who is thus gone, knows the knowledge that is the cessation of the ear-consciousness element as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba @48a *//🔽bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba @48a *// bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata knows as it really is the cessation of the knowledge of the cessation of the ear consciousness element.🔽The Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, having understood the cessation of the knowledge of the cessation of the ear consciousness element, having understood it through correct knowledge, having understood it through perfect knowledge, having become completely free from the taints of doubt and uncertainty, having become completely free from the taints of doubt and uncertainty through correct knowledge, having become completely free from the taints of doubt and uncertainty through perfect knowledge,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Translation: ཤེས་པ་དེ་ལ་ཡང་བསྐལ་པའམ་བསྐལ་པ་ལས་ལྷག་པར་ལན་གདབ་པར་སྤོབས་སོ།།

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this place, with its sandalwood walkways and mansions.”

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na; de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na; khyim bdag /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na; de bzhin gshegs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na; khyim bdag /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who has actualized the path that leads to the cessation of the ear-consciousness element, know and see it as it is?

original: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: The Tathāgata knows the ear consciousness element and understands it as it really is.🔽

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: It is to be understood.🔽🔽

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa nas gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa shes pa nas gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: The Tathāgata fully knows as it really is: ‘If, from the knowledge of the cessation of the eye that has been realized, one dwells contemplating the enjoyment of it,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /🔽gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am / gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if one dwells contemplating the danger in it,🔽or if one dwells contemplating the escape from it, then that will be so and so for that person.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: “The Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One, the one with insight and conduct, the Sugata, the knower of the world, the unsurpassed guide for those to be tamed, the teacher of gods and humans, the enlightened World-Honored One, with such a nose element, such a nose consciousness element, and such a knowledge of the path to the cessation of the nose element and nose consciousness element, when asked about it, could explain it, answer, and resolve questions about it for up to a whole eon, or even longer.

original: de ni / tsandan @48b gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan @48b gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood terrace and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is thus gone, know the nose element as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i yul yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i yul yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata knows the object of the nose as it truly is.

original: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyur byas pa dang ba gang yin pa ni /
analyzed: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyur byas pa dang ba gang yin pa ni /
translated: It is clear and is made the cause of the appropriated great elements.

original: sna'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: It is the nose’s ripening.

original: gang gi sna la dri snang bar 'gyur zhing dri'ang thogs pa dang / sna gang dri dag la thogs pa dang / sna gang la dri thogs pa dang / sna gang gis dri bsnams pa dang / snom pa dang / snom par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: gang gi sna la dri snang bar 'gyur zhing dri'ang thogs pa dang / sna gang dri dag la thogs pa dang / sna gang la dri thogs pa dang / sna gang gis dri bsnams pa dang / snom pa dang / snom par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: The nose is where smells appear, and smells are what the nose encounters. The nose is what smells encounter, and it is what smells are in. It is the nose that smells smells, that is smelling, and that will smell.

original: dri dag bsnam pa'i phyir yang tha mi dad cing rung ba'i sna gang yin pa dang / khams bco brgyad dag las sna'i khams gang yin pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dag las sna'i skye mched gang yin pa dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dag las sna'i dbang po gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: dri dag bsnam pa'i phyir yang tha mi dad cing rung ba'i sna gang yin pa dang / khams bco brgyad dag las sna'i khams gang yin pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dag las sna'i skye mched gang yin pa dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dag las sna'i dbang po gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the nose that is not different from and is suitable for smelling smells. It is the nose sense base among the eighteen constituents, it is the nose faculty among the twelve sense spheres, and it is the nose faculty among the twenty-two faculties.

original: de ni / sna'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sna'ang yin /
translated: It is the nose.

original: de ni / sna'i khams kyang yin /🔽de ni / sna'i skye mched kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sna'i khams kyang yin / de ni / sna'i skye mched kyang yin /
translated: It is the olfactory sphere.🔽It is the olfactory sense-source.

original: de ni / sna'i dbang po'ang yin; de ni /
analyzed: de ni / sna'i dbang po'ang yin; de ni /
translated: It is the olfactory faculty.

original: sgo'ang yin / de ni /
analyzed: sgo'ang yin / de ni /
translated: It is a door.

original: dkar ba'ang yin /
analyzed: dkar ba'ang yin /
translated: It is white.

original: de ni / rgyun kyang yin /🔽de ni / mtsho'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / rgyun kyang yin / de ni / mtsho'ang yin /
translated: It is a stream.🔽It is an ocean.

original: de ni / rgya mtsho'ang yin /🔽de ni / klong yang yin /
analyzed: de ni / rgya mtsho'ang yin / de ni / klong yang yin /
translated: It is a great ocean.🔽It is a whirlpool.

original: de ni / @49a *//
analyzed: de ni / @49a *//
translated: It is a

original: snang ba'ang yin /
analyzed: snang ba'ang yin /
translated: light.

original: de ni gsang ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni gsang ba'ang yin /
translated: It is a secret.

original: de ni 'byung ba'ang yin /🔽de ni khrid byed kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni 'byung ba'ang yin / de ni khrid byed kyang yin /
translated: It is an element.🔽It is a guide.

original: de ni 'dren byed kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni 'dren byed kyang yin /
translated: It is a leader.

original: de ni / zhing yang yin /
analyzed: de ni / zhing yang yin /
translated: It is a field.

original: de ni; chu 'byung yang yin /
analyzed: de ni; chu 'byung yang yin /
translated: It is a water source.

original: de ni / dngos po'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / dngos po'ang yin /
translated: It is a thing.

original: de ni / sbubs kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sbubs kyang yin /
translated: It is a sheath.

original: de ni / gsang ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / gsang ba'ang yin /
translated: It is a secret.

original: de ni / pha rol gyi 'gram ma yin pa'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / pha rol gyi 'gram ma yin pa'ang yin /
translated: It is not the other shore.

original: de ni / bdud kyi snod kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / bdud kyi snod kyang yin /
translated: It is a vessel of Māra.

original: de ni / grong stong bar 'jug pa'ang yin /🔽de ni / mngon par shes par bya ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / grong stong bar 'jug pa'ang yin / de ni / mngon par shes par bya ba'ang yin /
translated: It is entering an empty village.🔽It is to be supernaturally cognized.

original: de ni / yongs su shes par bya ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / yongs su shes par bya ba'ang yin /
translated: It is to be fully cognized.

original: de ni; spang bar bya ba'ang yin te /
analyzed: de ni; spang bar bya ba'ang yin te /
translated: It is also to be abandoned.

original: 'di ni / sna'i khams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / sna'i khams zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the nose element.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / khams gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / khams gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, full understanding, and element of that is

original: sna'i khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sna'i khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: called the knowledge of the nose element.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has fully known the knowledge of the nose element as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: If there were a question about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the nose element that lasted an eon, or more than an eon, the Tathāgata would answer that question and his eloquence would not be exhausted.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would be inexhaustible.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, he would answer questions about the knowledge of the tongue element, the knowledge of the body element, and the knowledge of the thinking element.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par @49b 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par @49b 'gyur ro //
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and this fine house.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how is it

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One know the knowledge of the arising of the nose constituent as it really is?”

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa rna bskyed nas sna'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / khyim bdag /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa rna bskyed nas sna'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / khyim bdag /
translated: ‘Having generated the roots of virtue for immeasurable, countless eons, the knowledge of the arising of the nose constituent is accomplished.’

original: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Moreover, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis sna'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis sna'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: ‘The causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the arising of the nose constituent is accomplished—those causes and conditions he knows as they really are.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If he abides contemplating impermanence,

original: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: If he abides in the subsequent observation of the adversary, the Tathāgata knows it just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: If he were to be questioned about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the nose constituent, he could answer those questions for an eon, or even for eons equal to the number of sand particles in the Ganges River.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would not be exhausted.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod pa @50a *//
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod pa @50a *//
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.

original: 'gyur ro // khyim bdag /🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: how does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the nose constituent?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don mdzad cing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don mdzad cing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata, having done what had to be done, having done his duty, having laid down the burden, having attained his own welfare, having severed the fetters of existence, has been freed through right knowledge.

original: snang ba mdzad cing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar mdzad nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba mdzad cing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar mdzad nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: He illuminates appearances and dispels darkness, and having liberated countless sentient beings from suffering, he leads them to happiness.

original: sna'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
translated: This is the knowledge of the cessation of the nose-consciousness element.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: Moreover, it is a quality that has never arisen from the beginning.

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: Householder, in this way

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata has thoroughly understood the knowledge of the cessation of the nose-consciousness element as it truly is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about this knowledge of the cessation of the nose-consciousness element, he would answer for an eon and so on,

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: and he would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the nose constituent?”🔽“Householder, here the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge by which he knows,

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de @50b bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de @50b bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis yongs su shes /
translated: understands,

original: khong du chud /🔽mngon sum du mdzad pa'i shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khong du chud / mngon sum du mdzad pa'i shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: and actualizes.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If he abides observing the experience of the nose,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /🔽gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am / gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: if he abides observing the faults of the nose,🔽or if he abides observing the escape from the nose, he knows that as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: “If one were to ask why the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the nose constituent,

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the fine house.🔽Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the element of smell as it really is?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas dri'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /🔽khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i yul shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas dri'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na / khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i yul shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata knows the consciousness of the object of smell as it really is.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dri zhim pa dang / dri nga ba dang / dro 'dod pa dang / dri sdug pa dang / dri mi sdug pa dang / dri yid du 'ong pa dang / dri yid du mi 'ong ba dang / dri yid du 'thad pa dang / dri yid du mi 'thad pa dang /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dri zhim pa dang / dri nga ba dang / dro 'dod pa dang / dri sdug pa dang / dri mi sdug pa dang / dri yid du 'ong pa dang / dri yid du mi 'ong ba dang / dri yid du 'thad pa dang / dri yid du mi 'thad pa dang /
translated: It is as follows:🔽good smell, bad smell, desirable smell, undesirable smell, pleasant smell, unpleasant smell, agreeable smell, disagreeable smell,🔽the essence of smell that is delightful, the essence of smell that is not delightful, the essence of smell that is acceptable, the essence of smell that is not acceptable,

original: dri'i ngo bo dga' ba dang / dri'i ngo bo mi dga' ba dang / dri'i ngo bo legs @51a *//
analyzed: dri'i ngo bo dga' ba dang / dri'i ngo bo mi dga' ba dang / dri'i ngo bo legs @51a *//
translated: the essence of smell that is surpassable, the essence of smell that is unsurpassable, the essence of smell that is to be given up, the essence of smell that is not to be given up, the essence of smell that is to be cultivated, the essence of smell that is not to be cultivated, the essence of smell that is to be fully known, the essence of smell that is not to be fully known.

original: pa dang / dri'i ngo bo mi legs pa dang / snod na yod pa dang / rtsa ba la yod pa dang / snying po la yod pa dang / snying po med pa la yod pa dang / shun pa la yod pa dang / ngar ba la yod pa dang /
analyzed: pa dang / dri'i ngo bo mi legs pa dang / snod na yod pa dang / rtsa ba la yod pa dang / snying po la yod pa dang / snying po med pa la yod pa dang / shun pa la yod pa dang / ngar ba la yod pa dang /
translated: the smell of the root, the smell of the heart, the smell of the pith, the smell of the bark, the smell of the sap,

original: lo ma la yod pa dang / me tog la yod pa dang / 'bras bu la yod pa'i dri gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: lo ma la yod pa dang / me tog la yod pa dang / 'bras bu la yod pa'i dri gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: the smell of the leaves, the smell of the flowers, and the smell of the fruit.

original: dri'i khams zhes bya zhing /
analyzed: dri'i khams zhes bya zhing /
translated: This is called the smell element.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, thorough understanding, and expertise regarding this

original: dri'i khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: dri'i khams shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: is called the knowledge of the smell element.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Thus-Gone One thoroughly knows it just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa nas bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa nas bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If someone were to ask the Thus-Gone One about the knowledge of the smell element, he would answer their question and explain it in detail for an eon, or even longer than an eon.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas dri'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas dri'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is thus gone, know the knowledge of the arising of the element of smell just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, in this regard, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa @51b ba bskyed nas dri'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / khyim bdag /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa @51b ba bskyed nas dri'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / khyim bdag /
translated: “Having generated the roots of virtue for immeasurable buddha bhagavāns, the knowledge of the arising of the element of smell is accomplished.”

original: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis dri'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis dri'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, moreover, the Tathāgata knows just as it is the cause and condition by which the knowledge of the arising of the element of smell is accomplished.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If they abide in the observation of impermanence,

original: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if they abide in the observation of opposition, the Tathāgata knows it as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: “If you were to ask in regard to the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the understanding of the element of smell,

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: you would be doing so for the sake of enjoying this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas dri'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas dri'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, if you ask how the Tathāgata knows the cessation of the understanding of the element of smell as it really is,

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: the Tathāgata has understood this:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: ‘Having benefited countless beings and turned them away from harm,

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te /
translated: having illuminated and dispelled darkness,

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas @52a *//
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas @52a *//
translated: Having freed countless sentient beings from suffering

original: bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: and established them in happiness,

original: dri'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: dri'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
translated: he knows the cessation of the knowledge of the element of smell.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: Moreover, it is a quality that has not arisen from the beginning.

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: Householder, in this way

original: de bzhin gshegs pas dri'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas dri'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the element of smell.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: When asked about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the element of smell, he would answer for an eon, and in the same vein,

original: bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
analyzed: bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag tu lan gsung ste /
translated: he would answer for eons that are inexpressible, and so on up to eons that are inexpressibly inexpressible.

original: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: His eloquence would not be exhausted.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how

original: de bzhin gshegs pas dri'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas dri'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata know the path the cessation of the knowledge of the element of smell as it really is?”🔽“Householder, here the Tathāgata, with knowledge, knows the cessation of the knowledge of the element of smell as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis dri'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /🔽khong du chud /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis dri'i khams shes pa yongs su shes / khong du chud /
translated: He knows it as it really is.🔽The Tathāgata knows that as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.
