analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta par gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.🔽He knows it as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If you ask about the cessation of the path that is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the element of smell, I would say after a kalpa, and so on.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this place, from the sandalwood ground up to the mansion.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the element of olfactory consciousness?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, here the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sna dang dri la brten nas sna'i rnam par shes pa skye ste /
analyzed: sna dang dri la brten nas sna'i rnam par shes pa skye ste /
translated: Olfactory consciousness arises in dependence on the nose and smells.

original: dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de skye ba na nang gi sna las kyang ma byung /
analyzed: dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de skye ba na nang gi sna las kyang ma byung /
translated: Its defining characteristic is the individual perception of things. When it arises, it does not come from anywhere,

original: phyi rol gyi dri dag las kyang ma 'ongs /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dri dag las kyang ma 'ongs /
translated: nor does it come from the external smells.

original: bar du rnam par bzung ste'ang mi gnas /
analyzed: bar du rnam par bzung ste'ang mi gnas /
translated: It does not remain in the middle, having been apprehended.

original: 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med la /
analyzed: 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med la /
translated: It does not come and it does not go.

original: stong zhing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin no //
analyzed: stong zhing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin no //
translated: It is empty and devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, thorough understanding, and expertise that is in regard to that is called

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams @53a *//🔽shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams @53a *// shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: the nose-consciousness element.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has fully known the nose-consciousness element just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: If one were to ask questions about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the nose-consciousness element for an eon or more than an eon,

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o //
translated: he would be able to answer them all, and so on up to he would enjoy the sandalwood parks and palaces.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how is it that

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: the Tathāgata has fully known the knowledge of the arising of the nose-consciousness element just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows this thus:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to
translated: Having planted the roots of virtue with immeasurable Buddha Bhagavāns, the knowledge of the origin of the consciousness element of the nose is accomplished. The Tathāgata knows it as it truly is.

original: // khyim bdag /
analyzed: // khyim bdag /
translated: Householder,

original: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: the Tathāgata knows this thus:

original: rgyu gang dang / skyen gang dag gis sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / skyen gang dag gis sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the origin of the consciousness element of the nose is accomplished, those causes and conditions he knows as they truly are.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes @53b su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes @53b su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one abides in the view of impermanence,

original: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: If he abides in the subsequent observation of the adversary, the Tathāgata knows it just as it is.🔽“The Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One knows the arising of the consciousness element of the nose just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /🔽tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o // khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: He who has questions about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the consciousness element of the nose may ask them, and I will answer his questions and satisfy him.”🔽“Householder, how does the Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One know the cessation of the consciousness element of the nose just as it is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One knows as it really is the cessation of the consciousness element of the nose.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: He has benefited countless beings and averted what is not beneficial.

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: He has dispelled darkness and brought immeasurable beings to complete liberation from suffering and to happiness.

original: sna'i khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /
translated: The cessation of the nose-consciousness element

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: is also unborn from the beginning.

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Householder, in this way🔽the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the nose-consciousness element.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes @54a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes @54a *//
translated: The Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One,

original: pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: when asked a question about the knowledge of the cessation of the nose-consciousness element, would answer for an eon and more.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder, how

original: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “How does the Tathāgata, who is the knower of the field of the cessation of the nose consciousness, know the path that leads to the cessation of the nose consciousness?”

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /🔽khong du chud /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yongs su shes / khong du chud /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata knows the consciousness that fully knows the nose consciousness,🔽that understands it,

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i shes pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: and that actualizes it, just as it is.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one abides in the observation of the absence of enjoyment,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: if one abides in the observation of the disadvantages,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if one abides in the observation of the escape, the Tathāgata knows that just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If one were to ask about the knowledge of the path the cessation of the nose consciousness element, the answer would be spoken for an eon, and so on.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the mansion.

original: @54b khyim bdag /🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: @54b khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: Householder!

original: de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: How does the Tathāgata know the tongue element as it really is?🔽Householder!

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Here the Tathāgata knows it thus:

original: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa'i dang ba gang yin pa ni /
analyzed: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa'i dang ba gang yin pa ni /
translated: The tongue element that is derived from the appropriated great elements

original: lce'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: is the result of the tongue.

original: lce'i skye mched gang la ro snang bar 'gyur ba dang / ro'ang thogs pa dang / lce gang ro dag la thogs pa dang / lce gang la'ang ro thogs pa dang / ro myangs pa dang / lce gang ro myong ba dang / ro myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: lce'i skye mched gang la ro snang bar 'gyur ba dang / ro'ang thogs pa dang / lce gang ro dag la thogs pa dang / lce gang la'ang ro thogs pa dang / ro myangs pa dang / lce gang ro myong ba dang / ro myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: The tongue faculty is that which is always suitable and inseparable for the appearance of tastes, for the contact of tastes, for the contact of tastes with the tongue, for the contact of the tongue with tastes, for the experience of tastes, for the tongue that experiences tastes, for the experience of tastes,🔽and for the tasting of tastes.

original: ro dag myang bar bya ba'i phyir rtag tu tha mi dad cing rung ba'i lce gang yin pa dang / khams bco brgyad dag las lce'i khams gang yin pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dag las lce'i skye mched gang yin pa dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dag las lce'i dbang po gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: ro dag myang bar bya ba'i phyir rtag tu tha mi dad cing rung ba'i lce gang yin pa dang / khams bco brgyad dag las lce'i khams gang yin pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dag las lce'i skye mched gang yin pa dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dag las lce'i dbang po gang yin pa ste /
translated: The tongue element is that which is among the eighteen elements. The tongue sense source is that which is among the twelve sense sources. The tongue faculty is that which is among the twenty-two faculties.

original: de ni / lce'ang yin /🔽de ni; lce'i khams kyang yin /🔽de ni / lce'i skye mched kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / lce'ang yin / de ni; lce'i khams kyang yin / de ni / lce'i skye mched kyang yin /
translated: It is the tongue.🔽It is the tongue element.🔽It is the tongue sense source.

original: de ni / lce'i dbang po'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / lce'i dbang po'ang yin /
translated: It is the tongue faculty.

original: de ni / sgo'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sgo'ang yin /
translated: It is a door.

original: de ni / dkar ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / dkar ba'ang yin /
translated: It is white.

original: de ni / rgyun kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / rgyun kyang yin /
translated: It is a continuum.

original: de ni / mtsho'ang yin /🔽de ni / rgya mtsho'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / mtsho'ang yin / de ni / rgya mtsho'ang yin /
translated: It is also a lake.🔽It is also an ocean.

original: de ni / klong yang yin /
analyzed: de ni / klong yang yin /
translated: It is also a pool.

original: de ni / snang ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / snang ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also a light.

original: de ni / chu 'byung yang yin /🔽de ni / khrid @55a *//🔽byed kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / chu 'byung yang yin / de ni / khrid @55a *// byed kyang yin /
translated: It is also a source of water.🔽It is also a guide.

original: de ni / 'dren byed kyang yin /🔽de ni / zhing yang yin /
analyzed: de ni / 'dren byed kyang yin / de ni / zhing yang yin /
translated: It is also a leader.🔽It is also a field.

original: de ni / dngos po 'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / dngos po 'ang yin /
translated: It is also a thing.

original: de ni / sbubs kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sbubs kyang yin /
translated: It is also a sheath.

original: de ni / gsang ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / gsang ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also a secret.

original: de ni / pha rol gyi 'gram ma yin pa'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / pha rol gyi 'gram ma yin pa'ang yin /
translated: It is also not the other shore.

original: de ni / bdud kyi snod kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / bdud kyi snod kyang yin /
translated: It is also a vessel of Māra.

original: de ni / bdag gi dngos por 'jug pa'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / bdag gi dngos por 'jug pa'ang yin /
translated: It is also an engagement with one’s own thing.

original: de ni / grong stong par 'jug pa'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / grong stong par 'jug pa'ang yin /
translated: It is also an engagement with an empty village.

original: de ni / mngon par shes par bya ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / mngon par shes par bya ba'ang yin /
translated: It is also to be directly perceived.

original: de ni / yongs su shes par bya ba yin /
analyzed: de ni / yongs su shes par bya ba yin /
translated: It is to be thoroughly known.

original: de ni / spang bar bya ba'ang yin te /
analyzed: de ni / spang bar bya ba'ang yin te /
translated: It is also to be abandoned.

original: de ni; lce'i khams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni; lce'i khams zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the tongue element.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: “The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, full understanding, and expertise that is in regard to the tongue element is the knowledge of the tongue element.

original: lce'i khams shes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i khams shes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: “The knowledge of the tongue element is the knowledge of the tongue element.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has fully known the tongue element as it really is.🔽If one were to ask why the Tathāgata has fully known the tongue element as it really is, it is as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /🔽tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen @55b ce na; khyim bdag /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o // khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen @55b ce na; khyim bdag /
translated: If one were to ask why the Tathāgata has fully known the arising of the tongue element as it really is, it is as follows:🔽“Householder, if one were to ask how the Tathāgata has fully known the cessation of the tongue element as it really is, householder, the Tathāgata has fully known the cessation of the tongue element as it really is.

original: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, if one were to ask how the Tathāgata has fully known the arising of the tongue element as it really is, householder, the Tathāgata has fully known the arising of the tongue element as it really is.🔽“Householder, if one were to ask how the Tathāgata has fully known the cessation of the tongue element as it really is, householder, the Tathāgata has fully known the cessation of the tongue element as it really is.🔽“Householder, if one were to ask how the Tathāgata has fully known the cessation of the tongue element as it really is, householder, the Tathāgata has fully known the cessation of the tongue element as it really is.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lce'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lce'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Having planted wholesome roots with immeasurable Buddha Bhagavāns, the Tathāgata perfectly knows the cause of the correct accomplishment of the knowledge of the arising of the tongue element, just as it is.

original: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Moreover, Householder, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: rgya gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis lce'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgya gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis lce'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata perfectly knows, just as it is, the cause and condition of the correct accomplishment of the knowledge of the arising of the tongue element, just as it is.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one abides in the observation of impermanence,

original: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if one abides in the observation of opposition, the Tathāgata perfectly knows that, just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de ni /
translated: If he were asked about the knowledge of the arising of the tongue element, he would answer for an eon without ever running out,

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o; ;khyim bdag /🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o; ;khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: and he would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the tongue element?

original: khyim bdag / 'di @56a *//
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di @56a *//
translated: Householder,

original: la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la; snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal nas sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni; lce'i
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la; snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal nas sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni; lce'i
translated: Having benefited countless sentient beings and turned them away from what is not beneficial, having illuminated and dispelled darkness, having liberated countless sentient beings from the ocean of suffering and established them in happiness,

original: khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of the cessation of the tongue element is known.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: It is also unborn from the beginning.

original: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: Householder, in this way

original: de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: the Tathāgata knows as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the tongue element.🔽If the Tathāgata were to explain the knowledge of the cessation of the tongue element,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: he would continue to explain it for an eon or more.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and the fine mansion.

original: de bzhin gshegs par lce'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs par lce'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata know as it really is the knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the tongue element?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis lce'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis lce'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: Householder, in this case, the Tathāgata knows the knowledge of the tongue element as it really is.

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: He knows it as it is.

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa de de bzhin gshegs @56b pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa de de bzhin gshegs @56b pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The Tathāgata has perfect knowledge of the cessation of the tongue element.

original: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one dwells in the observation of the absence of relishing,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: if one dwells in the observation of the disadvantages,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if one dwells in the observation of escape, the Tathāgata has perfect knowledge of that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung zhing de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung zhing de'i spobs pa zad mi shes so //
translated: If one were to ask about the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the tongue element, the Tathāgata’s answer would be to speak of it as cessation.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ro'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ro'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata have perfect knowledge of the origination of the tongue element?🔽The Tathāgata has perfect knowledge of the origination of the tongue element.

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i khams kyi spyod yul yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i khams kyi spyod yul yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata knows as it really is the range of the tongue element:

original: 'di lta ste /🔽ro zhim pa nyid dang / ro mi zhim pa nyid dang / ro 'dod pa nyid dang / ro mi 'dod pa nyid dang / ro yi gar 'ong ba nyid dang / ro yi gar mi 'ong ba nyid dang / ro yid du 'ong ba nyid dang /🔽ro yid du mi 'ong ba nyid dang / ro'i ngo bo dga' ba nyid dang / ro'i ngo bo mi dga' ba nyid dang / ro'i ngo bo legs pa nyid dang / ro'i ngo bo ma legs pa @57a *//
analyzed: 'di lta ste / ro zhim pa nyid dang / ro mi zhim pa nyid dang / ro 'dod pa nyid dang / ro mi 'dod pa nyid dang / ro yi gar 'ong ba nyid dang / ro yi gar mi 'ong ba nyid dang / ro yid du 'ong ba nyid dang / ro yid du mi 'ong ba nyid dang / ro'i ngo bo dga' ba nyid dang / ro'i ngo bo mi dga' ba nyid dang / ro'i ngo bo legs pa nyid dang / ro'i ngo bo ma legs pa @57a *//
translated: namely,

analyzed: nyid dang / kha ba 'dzin pa dang / tsha ba 'dzin pa dang / skyur ba 'dzin pa dang / mngar ba 'dzin pa dang / ro ba tshva can nyid nas ro bska ba nyid dang / lan tshva'i ro dang / ro gang dag snod na yod pa dang /

original: rtsa ba la yod pa dang / snying po la yod pa dang / snying po med pa la yod pa dang / shun pa la yod pa dang / ngar ba la yod pa dang / lo ma la yod pa dang / me tog la yod pa dang /
analyzed: rtsa ba la yod pa dang / snying po la yod pa dang / snying po med pa la yod pa dang / shun pa la yod pa dang / ngar ba la yod pa dang / lo ma la yod pa dang / me tog la yod pa dang /
translated: It is the taste that exists in the root, the taste that exists in the heart, the taste that exists in the pith, the taste that exists in the bark, the taste that exists in the sap, the taste that exists in the leaves, the taste that exists in the flowers,

original: 'bras bu la yod pa'i bar gyi ro gang dag yod pa 'di ni ro'i khams zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu la yod pa'i bar gyi ro gang dag yod pa 'di ni ro'i khams zhes bya ste /
translated: and the taste that exists in the fruit.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has fully understood as they really are the taste elements.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ro'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung zhing de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ro'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung zhing de ni /
translated: If someone were to ask the Tathāgata a question about the taste elements, he could answer it.

original: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He could speak for an eon or more than an eon,🔽Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who has understood as it really is the origin of the taste elements,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ro'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ro'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: know the origin of the taste elements?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata knows this thus:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas ro'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba @57b shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas ro'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba @57b shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de /
translated: ‘Having planted wholesome roots with immeasurable Buddha Bhagavāns, the knowledge of the origin of the knowledge of the element of taste is accomplished.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata knows it as it really is.

original: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Moreover, householder, the Tathāgata knows this thus:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis ro'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /🔽gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis ro'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te / gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: ‘The causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the origin of the knowledge of the element of taste is accomplished, those causes and conditions he knows as they really are.🔽If he abides observing impermanence, and so on, in the same way, up to

original: phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de /
analyzed: phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de /
translated: if he abides observing opposition,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: The Tathāgata has understood it just as it is.🔽If someone were to ask you, ‘What is the cause of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste?’🔽you should answer them as follows: ‘The cause of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste itself.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la ro'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la ro'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te / de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you are asked, ‘What is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste?’🔽you should answer them as follows: ‘The Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste itself.’

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas ro'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas ro'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: If you are asked, ‘What is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste?’🔽you should answer them as follows: ‘The Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste itself.’🔽If you are asked, ‘What is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste?’🔽you should answer them as follows: ‘The Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste itself.’

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /🔽sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te / sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: If you are asked, ‘What is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste?’🔽you should answer them as follows: ‘The Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste itself.’🔽If you are asked, ‘What is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste?’

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs @58a *//
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs @58a *//
translated: you should answer them as follows: ‘The Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste itself.’

original: su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: If you are asked, ‘What is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste?’🔽you should answer them as follows: ‘The Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste is the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the arising of the element of taste itself.’

original: ro'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: ro'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the element of taste,🔽and that is unborn from the beginning.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no; ;khyim bdag /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no; ;khyim bdag / de ltar na /
translated: Householder,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ro'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ro'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: thus the Tathāgata, with his knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the element of taste, knows it as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ro'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ro'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If questioned about the knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the element of taste, the Tathāgata would answer for an eon or more than an eon, and so on as before.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood terrace and palace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ro'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ro'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder, how does the Tathāgata, with his knowledge of the cessation of the knowledge of the element of taste, know it as it really is?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa gang gis ro'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa gang gis ro'i khams shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: Householder, in this case the Tathāgata knows the knowledge of the element of taste as it really is.

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: He understands it,

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If the cessation that has been actualized is to be viewed in terms of the absence of relishing,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: or if it is to be viewed in terms of the disadvantages,🔽or if it is to be viewed in terms of deliverance, the Tathāgata knows it exactly as it is.

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: “If one were to ask, ‘Why is it that the Tathāgata, having known the path the way it really is, explains the path to his disciples? ’🔽the Tathāgata would answer, ‘It is this: the Tathāgata, having known the path the way it really is, explains the path to his disciples so that they may abandon all paths.🔽’ “Householder, if one were to ask, ‘Why is it that the Tathāgata, having known the cessation of the craving that creates new existences the way it really is, explains the cessation of the craving that creates new existences to his disciples? ’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ro'i khams @58b shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang // bde bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ro'i khams @58b shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te / de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang // bde bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: the Tathāgata would answer, ‘It is this: the Tathāgata, having known the cessation of the craving that creates new existences the way it really is, explains the cessation of the craving that creates new existences to his disciples so that the craving that creates new existences may be abandoned.🔽’ “Householder, if one were to ask, ‘Why is it that the Tathāgata, having known the cessation of the craving that creates new existences the way it really is, explains the cessation of the craving that creates new existences to his disciples? ’

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: the Tathāgata would answer, ‘It is this: the Tathāgata, having known the cessation of the craving that creates new existences the way it really is, explains the cessation of the craving that creates new existences to his disciples so that the craving that creates new existences may be abandoned.🔽’

original: lce dang ro la brten nas lce'i rnam par shes pa skye ste /
analyzed: lce dang ro la brten nas lce'i rnam par shes pa skye ste /
translated: The tongue consciousness arises in dependence on the tongue and tastes.

original: dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de skye ba na nang gi lce las kyang ma byung /
analyzed: dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de skye ba na nang gi lce las kyang ma byung /
translated: Its defining characteristic is the individual perception of things. When it arises, it does not come from anywhere in particular,🔽nor does it come from the tongue itself,

original: phyi rol gyi ro dag las kyang ma 'ongs /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi ro dag las kyang ma 'ongs /
translated: nor does it come from tastes outside.

original: bar du rnam par bzung ste'ang mi gnas /
analyzed: bar du rnam par bzung ste'ang mi gnas /
translated: It does not stay in the middle,

original: 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med la /
analyzed: 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med la /
translated: nor does it go anywhere in particular.

original: stong zhing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin no //
analyzed: stong zhing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin no //
translated: It is empty and devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, illumination, realization, full understanding, and expertise that is in regard to that

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa zhes bya ste /🔽da da bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa zhes bya ste / da da bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: is called the knowledge of the tongue consciousness element.🔽The Tathāgata has fully known the knowledge of the tongue consciousness element in the same way.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par @59a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par @59a *//
translated: If you were to ask me about the knowledge of the tongue consciousness element that the Tathāgata has,

original: lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te / de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having understood them as they really are, he has also understood as it really is the cessation of the tongue consciousness element.🔽Having understood as it really is the cessation of the tongue consciousness element, he has understood as it really is the path whose nature is to lead to the cessation of the tongue consciousness element.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the tongue consciousness element.

original: khyim bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: khyim bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the tongue consciousness element.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the path whose nature is to lead to the cessation of the tongue consciousness element.

original: khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the body consciousness element.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the body consciousness element.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the path whose nature is to lead to the cessation of the body consciousness element.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the mind consciousness element.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the mind consciousness element.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the path whose nature is to lead to the cessation of the mind consciousness element.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the eye contact element.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the cessation of the eye contact element.🔽“Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the path whose nature is to lead to the cessation of the eye contact element.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata has understood as it really is the knowledge of the arising of the ear contact element.

original: // khyim bdag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: // khyim bdag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathā

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: He knows perfectly the causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the arising of the tongue consciousness element is accomplished.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa nas gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa'i bar de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: If one abides in the observation of impermanence, up to if one abides in the observation of opposition, the Tathāgata knows that perfectly as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i rnam par @59b shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i rnam par @59b shes pa'i khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If one were to ask the Tathāgata about the knowledge of the arising of the tongue consciousness element, he would answer for an eon and more besides.

original: de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and palace.

original: khyim bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: khyim bdag ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who has comprehended the cessation of the tongue consciousness element, know the cessation of the tongue consciousness element as it really is?

original: khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, the Tathāgata has comprehended this:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /
translated: having benefited immeasurable sentient beings and turned them away from what is not beneficial,

original: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal te sems can dpag tu med pa rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas nas bde ba la btsud pa ni /
translated: having illuminated what was obscure and removed the darkness, having liberated immeasurable sentient beings from their suffering and having brought them to happiness,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ste /
translated: he has comprehended the cessation of the tongue consciousness element.

original: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de'ang gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: And that is originally unborn.

original: khyim bdag de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: khyim bdag de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Householder, it is by such knowledge that the Tathāgata, who has comprehended the cessation of the tongue consciousness element, knows the cessation of the tongue consciousness element as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal bar lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: “Householder, when asked, ‘How does the Tathāgata, who has understood the cessation of the tongue consciousness element, understand the cessation of the tongue consciousness element? ’

original: de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: he would answer, ‘It is the enjoyment of this sandalwood courtyard and this mansion. ’

original: khyim @60a *// bdag /🔽ji ltar na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: khyim @60a *// bdag / ji ltar na / de bzhin gshegs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: Householder,🔽how does the Tathāgata, who has understood the cessation of the tongue consciousness element, understand the cessation of the tongue consciousness element?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yongs su shes /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa gang gis lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa yongs su shes /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata, who has understood the cessation of the tongue consciousness element, understands the cessation of the tongue consciousness element by means of the knowledge that is the cessation of the tongue consciousness element.

original: khong du chud /
analyzed: khong du chud /
translated: He understands it, penetrates it,🔽fully understands it, and realizes it with his own insight.

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa de gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i 'gog pa de gal te ro myang ba med par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If that cessation is not without relishing, he would abide in the observation of the absence of relishing,

original: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te nyes dmigs su rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If they abide in the view of the disadvantages,

original: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te nges par 'byung bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if they abide in the view of the escape, the Tathāgata knows it just as it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: “If one were to ask, ‘Is the path that leads to the cessation of the knowledge of the Tathāgata’s knowledge of the cessation of the tongue consciousness element? ’, then the answer would be: ‘It is the ārya truth of the path. ’ If one were to ask why, then this is how it should be explained:

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro // khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: ‘It is the path, the way, the realization, the practice, and the performance of giving up the tongue consciousness element. ’

original: de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi khams shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata know the knowledge of the body element?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: “Householder, here the Tathāgata has understood as it really is:

original: zin @60b pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyur byas pa dang ba gang yin pa ni /
analyzed: zin @60b pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyur byas pa dang ba gang yin pa ni /
translated: ‘The clear form that is a cause derived from the great elements that are appropriated

original: lus kyi rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: It is the body’s ripening.

original: lus gang gi reg bya snang bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: lus gang gi reg bya snang bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: It is the body that appears as the tactile object.

original: reg bya'ang thogs pa dang / lus gang reg bya la thogs pa dang / lus gang la reg bya'ang thogs pa dang / lus gang gis reg bya la reg par gyur pa dang / reg pa dang / reg par 'gyur ba dang / reg bya la reg par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu tha mi dad cing rung ba'i lus gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: reg bya'ang thogs pa dang / lus gang reg bya la thogs pa dang / lus gang la reg bya'ang thogs pa dang / lus gang gis reg bya la reg par gyur pa dang / reg pa dang / reg par 'gyur ba dang / reg bya la reg par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu tha mi dad cing rung ba'i lus gang yin pa dang /
translated: It is the body that is obstructed by the tactile object. It is the tactile object that is obstructed by the body. It is the body that is obstructed by the tactile object. It is the body by which one touches the tactile object. It is the tactile object that is touched. It is the body that touches. It is the body that is always suitable for touching the tactile object without being different from it.

original: khams bco brgyad dag las lus kyi khams gang yin pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dag las lus kyi skye mched gang yin pa dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dag las lus kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: khams bco brgyad dag las lus kyi khams gang yin pa dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dag las lus kyi skye mched gang yin pa dang / dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dag las lus kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the body element among the eighteen elements. It is the body sense-sphere among the twelve sense-spheres. It is the body faculty among the twenty-two faculties.

original: de ni / lus kyang yin /🔽de ni / lus kyi khams kyang yin /🔽de ni / lus kyi skye mched kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / lus kyang yin / de ni / lus kyi khams kyang yin / de ni / lus kyi skye mched kyang yin /
translated: It is the body.🔽It is the body element.🔽It is the body sense-sphere.

original: de ni / lus kyi dbang po'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / lus kyi dbang po'ang yin /
translated: It is the body faculty.

original: de ni / sgo'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sgo'ang yin /
translated: It is the door.

original: de ni / dkar ba'ang yin /🔽de ni / rgyun kyang yin; de ni /
analyzed: de ni / dkar ba'ang yin / de ni / rgyun kyang yin; de ni /
translated: It is white.🔽It is a stream.

original: mtsho'ang yin / de ni /🔽rgya mtsho'ang yin /
analyzed: mtsho'ang yin / de ni / rgya mtsho'ang yin /
translated: It is an ocean.🔽It is a great ocean.

original: de ni / klong yang yin /
analyzed: de ni / klong yang yin /
translated: It is a lake.

original: de ni / snang ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / snang ba'ang yin /
translated: It is a light.

original: de ni / chu 'byung yang yin /🔽de ni / khrid byed kyang yin; de ni /
analyzed: de ni / chu 'byung yang yin / de ni / khrid byed kyang yin; de ni /
translated: It is a source of water.🔽It is a guide.

original: 'dren byed kyang yin /
analyzed: 'dren byed kyang yin /
translated: It is a leader.

original: de ni / zhing yang yin /
analyzed: de ni / zhing yang yin /
translated: It is a field.

original: de ni / dngos po'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / dngos po'ang yin /
translated: It is a thing.

original: de ni / sbubs kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / sbubs kyang yin /
translated: It is a sheath.

original: de ni / gsang ba'ang yin /🔽de ni / pha rol @61a *//
analyzed: de ni / gsang ba'ang yin / de ni / pha rol @61a *//
translated: It is a secret.

original: gyi 'gram ma yin pa'ang yin /
analyzed: gyi 'gram ma yin pa'ang yin /
translated: It is not the other shore.

original: de ni / bdud kyi snod kyang yin /
analyzed: de ni / bdud kyi snod kyang yin /
translated: It is a vessel of Māra.

original: de ni / bdag gi dngos por 'jug pa'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / bdag gi dngos por 'jug pa'ang yin /
translated: It is the engagement with one’s own thing.

original: de ni / grong stong par 'jug pa'ang yin /🔽de ni / mngon par shes par bya ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / grong stong par 'jug pa'ang yin / de ni / mngon par shes par bya ba'ang yin /
translated: It is the engagement with an empty village.🔽It is to be directly perceived.

original: de ni / yongs su shes par bya ba'ang yin /
analyzed: de ni / yongs su shes par bya ba'ang yin /
translated: It is to be fully understood.

original: de ni / spang bar bya ba'ang yin te /
analyzed: de ni / spang bar bya ba'ang yin te /
translated: It is to be abandoned.

original: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / gsal ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mkhas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: The knowledge, seeing, clarity, realization, full understanding, and expertise that are in regard to the element of tactile consciousness,🔽the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, has fully awakened to them.🔽He has attained mastery over the element of tactile consciousness.🔽He has attained mastery over the element of tactile consciousness.🔽He has attained mastery over the element of tactile consciousness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: He has attained mastery over the element of tactile consciousness.

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: He has attained mastery over the element

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lus kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba @61b bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lus kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba @61b bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: Having planted wholesome roots with immeasurable Buddha Bhagavāns, the knowledge of the origin of the knowledge of the body element is accomplished. The Tathāgata knows it as it really is.

original: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Moreover, the Tathāgata knows in this way:

original: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis lus kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang dmigs pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dag gis lus kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang dmigs pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: The causes and conditions by which the knowledge of the origin of the knowledge of the body element is accomplished, those causes, those conditions, and those objects are known as they really are.

original: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag par rjes su blta bar gnas pa'am /
translated: If one abides in the observation of impermanence,

original: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol bar rjes su blta bar gnas pa de de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to //
translated: or if one abides in the observation of opposition, the Tathāgata knows it as it really is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lus kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lus kyi khams shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa de la'ang zhu ba zhus pa na bskal par lan gsung ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: If he were to be asked about the knowledge of the arising of the element of matter, he could answer for an eon, or even longer than an eon.

original: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / tsandan gyi khyams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He would enjoy this sandalwood courtyard and this fine house.

original: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
analyzed: khyim bdag / ji ltar na /
translated: “Householder, how does the Tathāgata, who is the knower of the ultimate truth,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen ce na /
translated: know the cessation of the knowledge of the element of matter?

original: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: khyim bdag / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Householder, the Tathāgata knows thus:

original: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la /🔽snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal nas de bzhin du sbyar te bde ba la btsud pa'i bar ni /🔽lus kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa ste /🔽de'ang gzod ma nas ma @62a *//🔽skyes pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas shing don ma yin pa bzlog la / snang ba byas shing mun pa bsal nas de bzhin du sbyar te bde ba la btsud pa'i bar ni / lus kyi khams shes pa 'gog pa ste / de'ang gzod ma nas ma @62a *// skyes pa'i chos can no //
translated: “Having done what was to be done for countless sentient beings, having turned away what was not to be done,
